web_snippets: John Jack Pitney, Jr. (born June 18, 1955) is an American political scientist. He is the Roy P. Crocker Professor of Politics at Claremont McKenna College.
Jack Pitney has spent his entire academic career at CMC. As he marks his 35th work anniversary, the beloved government professor reminisces ...
Jack Pitney. Professor at Claremont McKenna College. Claremont McKenna College Yale University. Claremont, California, United States.
